info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: T.M. Nawar

publications.text: ‘Augustine on the Varieties of Understanding and Why There is No Learning from Words’, Oxford Studies in Medieval Philosophy (2015) [PDF proof]
‘The Stoic Account of Apprehension’, Philosophers’ Imprint (2014) [open access]
‘Knowledge and True Belief at Theaetetus 201a-c’, British Journal for the History of Philosophy (2013)  [PDF offprint]  (commended in the 2013 BSHP Essay Prize Competition)
